response.original_title: ON THE EDGE OF A DREAM
response.overview: For the past five years, Ellis Ericson and Andrew Kidman have been working with George Greenough on the modern evolution of his Edge Board design.  Ericson and Kidman are both shapers; the book and film chart their journey as they work with Greenough to personalize their own equipment with a design George has been toying around with since the late ‘60s.  Shot in Australia on the North Coast of New South Wales it features the original venues Lennox Head and Angourie where Greenough’s innovative Edge designs were tested in the early ‘70s.
response.title: ON THE EDGE OF A DREAM
